last_episode_to_air.name: The Big Jalpur Wedding Mystery
last_episode_to_air.overview: It’s the day of a huge, joyful wedding in Jalpur, and Mira and her friends must track down the missing groom so the wedding can go on as planned.

name: Mira, Royal Detective
overview: A brave and resourceful girl becomes a royal detective in India after solving a mystery that saved the kingdom's young prince.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Appointed to the role of royal detective by the queen of Jalpur, a resourceful commoner named Mira sets out on mystery-solving adventures along with her friend Prince Neel, creative cousin Priya, and comical mongoose sidekicks Mikku and Chikku.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Royal Scarf
episodes.overview: When the special scarf Priya designed for the Queen goes missing, it's up to Mira to help find it!

episodes.name: The Case of the Missing Bicycle
episodes.overview: Mira must juggle babysitting her cousin and searching for a missing bike.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Puppet Show
episodes.overview: Mikku and Chikku go undercover as puppets so they can help Mira catch a pickpocket.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the New Kid
episodes.overview: When a new kid in town is blamed for stealing an earring, Mira must figure out if he’s guilty.

episodes.name: The Case of the Dance Off Disaster
episodes.overview: Mira must figure out who is sabotaging performances at the dance competition.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Camel Fair
episodes.overview: When decorations for Priya and Meena’s entry into the camel fair go missing, Mira must investigate.

episodes.name: The Undercover Princess Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira goes undercover to find the precious Gem of Jalpur.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Fashion Show
episodes.overview: When a dress that Priya made for a fashion show goes missing, Mira discovers that it’s hiding in plain sight.

episodes.name: The Case of the Wrecked Recital
episodes.overview: When Prince Neel’s sitar goes missing, Mira must track it down before Great Aunt Rupa finds out.

episodes.name: The Case of the Vanishing Vessels
episodes.overview: Mira goes on a mysterious underground adventure to find toy boats for a race.

episodes.name: The Mongoose Cousin Mystery
episodes.overview: Mikku and Chikku’s cousins visit Jalpur for a kite festival.

episodes.name: The Marble Egg Mystery
episodes.overview: When the Prince loses a precious marble gift from the Queen, Mira sets out to find it.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Secret Gift-Giver
episodes.overview: When townspeople start receiving anonymous gifts, Mira searches for the secret gift-giver.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Cooking Contest
episodes.overview: Pinky’s dishes for the Queen’s cooking contest seem to be sabotaged.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Polo Player
episodes.overview: Mira is determined to figure out the identity of a mysterious polo player.

episodes.name: The Case of the Secret Treasure
episodes.overview: Mira, Priya and Neel discover a map that leads them to mysterious tunnels under the palace.

episodes.name: The Case of the Chiseling Chiselers
episodes.overview: When the royal sword goes missing, Mira agrees to help Veer find it.

episodes.name: A Patchwork Mystery
episodes.overview: On Jalpur's 400th birthday, Mira is tasked with finding Priya's special tapestry.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Marketplace
episodes.overview: When Meena wants to make special ladoos for her father’s homecoming party, Mira must help track down the spice merchant who has an essential ingredient.

episodes.name: Mystery in the Sand Dunes
episodes.overview: Neel's new vehicle disappears in a sandstorm, and Mira must search the desert to find it.

episodes.name: Mikku and Chikku: Doll Detectives
episodes.overview: Mikku and Chikku decide to start their own detective case, but Mira must help them when a missing doll mystery falls off the handle.

episodes.name: The Case of the Moving Day Meddler
episodes.overview: Plans for a moving day get interrupted when the tickets go missing.

episodes.name: The Topsy Turvy Tiffin Myster
episodes.overview: Mikku and Chikku accidentally mix up a tiffin delivery and Mira must fix it.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Invention Fair
episodes.overview: An important part of Druv's entry for the invention fair goes missing and Mira must find it before judging.

episodes.name: The Mystery of One Angry Chicken
episodes.overview: When Drhuv's pocket watch is found in Raj the chicken's coop, Mira must figure out how it got there.

episodes.name: A Tiny Tune Mystery
episodes.overview: Mikku and Chikku's instruments go missing, and Mira must track them down.

episodes.name: The Rakhi Mystery
episodes.overview: When the bracelets that Mira and her friends made for the Rakhi holiday disappear, Mira sets out to find them before the celebration starts.

episodes.name: Mystery Below the Palace
episodes.overview: The palace is being rocked by a mysterious stomping sound, and Mira has to find out where it's coming from.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Secret Room
episodes.overview: Mira finds a way out when she and her friends get stuck in a room in the palace.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Magnificent Musicians
episodes.overview: When everyone's instruments go missing, Mira must figure out if visiting musicians are to blame.

episodes.name: A Mystery Fit for a Queen
episodes.overview: When Queen Shanti’s lost jewelry suddenly turns up, Mira enlists the Queen to join her on the case.

episodes.name: The Case of Pinky and the Goat
episodes.overview: Mira asks her friend Pinky, the goat expert, to help find Dhruv’s pet goat.

episodes.name: A Seedy Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira's friends help solve the case when she loses a game that's been passed down through her family.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Jalpur Games
episodes.overview: When the archery arrows go missing during the Jalpur Games, Mira sets out to find them

episodes.name: Mystery at the Gymnastics Show
episodes.overview: Mira must find Preeti's lucky headband when it goes missing right before the gymnastics show.

episodes.name: The Case of the Curious Confetti
episodes.overview: When confetti starts popping up all over town, Mira searches for the source

episodes.name: The Great Diwali Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira must track down the missing oil used to light traditional lamps throughout the town in order to save the Diwali celebration.

episodes.name: The Case of the Curious Creature
episodes.overview: Mira investigates sightings of a legendary creature who is known to be a mischievous shoe thief.

episodes.name: The Mikku Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira and Chikku are on the case to find out what is scaring Mikku.

episodes.name: The Case of the Getaway Goats
episodes.overview: Mira investigates why the goats go missing in Jalpur.

episodes.name: The Case of the Mysterious Girl
episodes.overview: When a mysterious girl arrives in Jalpur, Mira sets out on the case to figure out her true identity.

episodes.name: Mystery on the Waterfront
episodes.overview: Mira must crack the case when Auntie Pushpa’s gold purse and other valuables go missing.

episodes.name: The Case of the Missing Library Book
episodes.overview: Mira must find the missing library book that everyone wants to read.

episodes.name: A Double Dosa Mystery
episodes.overview: When Sandeep’s dosa goes missing, Mira goes on a stakeout to discover who took it.

episodes.name: Mira's Birthday Mystery
episodes.overview: On Mira’s birthday, Queen Shanti asks her to solve a strange mystery.

episodes.name: The Great Art Mystery
episodes.overview: When an anonymous painting appears, Mira searches for the artist so it can be entered in Priya’s art show.

episodes.name: A Royal Detective Mystery
episodes.overview: When the former royal detective comes to town, Mira asks for his help with a cold case.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Missing Crown
episodes.overview: Mira must find the royal crown when it goes missing.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Appointed to the role of royal detective by the queen of Jalpur, a resourceful commoner named Mira sets out on mystery-solving adventures along with her friend Prince Neel, creative cousin Priya, and comical mongoose sidekicks Mikku and Chikku.

episodes.name: The Case of the Cunning Chameleon
episodes.overview: Mira shows Mikku and Chikku how to use their senses to find a missing chameleon.

episodes.name: The Great Polo Mystery
episodes.overview: When the mallets break at the polo match, Mira goes on the case to figure out what happened.

episodes.name: Mira’s Milestone Mystery
episodes.overview: Mikku and Chikku tell Mira that she filled up her first case book. She is soon on the case of solving a mystery, with the promise of a "big surprise" if she solves the case.

episodes.name: The Case of the Palace
episodes.overview: Meena's peacock, Koo, leaves her sight. Mira agrees to help her, while she has also said she will help Priya with Princess Shavini's new dress. Can she do both tasks at the same time, or will it tire her out?

episodes.name: The Case of Dimple’s Lost Tooth
episodes.overview: Dimple's family begins celebrating after learning that the baby tooth of their daughter, Dimple, had come out. Kamala takes the tooth and puts it in her pocket for safekeeping. However, in the process of going around the town with Dimple, Mira, Chikku, and Mikku, she loses it. Can Mira, Chikku, and Mikku find the tooth before it is too late?

episodes.name: The Case of the Slumber Party Ghost
episodes.overview: After leaving the palace and talking with Prince Neel about his new invention, Mira, Mikku, and Chikku go to a sleepover. That night, a mysterious sound causes Dimple to wake up, resulting in Kamala, Priya, and Mira beginning a search for the source of the sound.

episodes.name: Mystery Through the Front Window
episodes.overview: Mira sprains her ankle and is confined to her room, but Arvin gives her a case to find out what is blocking the water taxis. Mira still decides to take the case despite Priya advising her against it. Can she solve the case from her apartment?

episodes.name: The Case of the Fake Painting
episodes.overview: In an official tour of the palace, Mira and her friends are suspicious of the tour guides who claim to know everything. Prince Veer brings Priya and Mira to the library to have a first look at the painting but finds out it is fake, leading Mira to begin an investigation.

episodes.name: The Great Eid Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira’s friend Sadia asks for her help in solving the case when they find a lost holiday Eid gift envelope on the ground.

episodes.name: The Case of the Pinched Paintbrush  English
episodes.overview: When Priya’s special paintbrush goes missing, Mira must go on the case to help her find it.

episodes.name: Mystery in the Sky
episodes.overview: Mira sees something purple in the sky, but Mikku and Chikku have no idea what she is talking about. They ask Prince Neel for help and they fly in his new flying machine. Can they figure out the mystery?

episodes.name: The Case of the Message in a Bottle
episodes.overview: Mira finds a message in a bottle and works to solve the mystery behind the "island king" with the help of Prince Neel, Mikku, and Chikku.

episodes.name: The Case of the Lost Puppy
episodes.overview: When Mira and the mongooses find a lost puppy, they are on the case to find its family.

episodes.name: The Submarine Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira and Prince Neel are on the hunt for a submarine.

episodes.name: The Case of the Lost Treehouse
episodes.overview: When Sahil and his childhood friend can’t find their old treehouse, Mira is on the case.

episodes.name: The Case of the Vanishing Picnic
episodes.overview: Mira helps Mikku and Chikku find their missing basket of picnic food.

episodes.name: Mystery on the Overnight Train
episodes.overview: Mira’s mobile detective lab goes missing on an overnight train ride.

episodes.name: The Case of the Broken Hand Pump
episodes.overview: Mira and Princess Shivani go on the case to figure out what’s blocking a broken water pump.

episodes.name: The Case of the Runaway Tabla
episodes.overview: Mira helps a visiting musician find his missing tabla before a big performance.

episodes.name: The Bike Day Mystery
episodes.overview: On Jalpur’s Bike Day, Mira assists Ranjeet and Manjeet as they track down training wheels for a bike they made.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Naiyapuram Palace
episodes.overview: When Prince Veer's royal gift for the Queen of Naiyapuram's birthday goes missing, Mira goes on the case to find it.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Sweet Sale
episodes.overview: Mira is on the hunt for the annual Sweet Sale's missing sweets.

episodes.name: The Teej Festival Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira, Neeti and Preeti search for a missing basket of marigolds used for the Teej Festival.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Rangoli Competition
episodes.overview: Mira takes on a case when some Rangolis are ruined before Jalpur’s Rangoli competition.

episodes.name: The Great Kathak Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira and her friends must track down their missing ghungroo bells in order to perform with a Kathak dance guru.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Missing Parts
episodes.overview: When items start going missing around town, Mira is on the case.

episodes.name: The Fluffy Pillow Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira is on the case to help Mikku and Chikku find their beloved fluffy pillows.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Missing Jhumkas
episodes.overview: Auntie Pushpa is having a sale at her boutique and needs Mira's help finding missing earrings.

episodes.name: The Case of the Secret Singing Star
episodes.overview: Mira helps Meena find a mysterious singer to feature in the Jalpur talent show.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Missing Train
episodes.overview: When the Jalpur Express doesn't arrive at the train station, Mira is on the case!

episodes.name: The Case of the Disoriented Ducklings
episodes.overview: Mira and the mongooses are on the case to help stray ducklings find their mother.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Legendary Cave
episodes.overview: Mira and her friends set out to solve a cold case mystery to find a legendary cave.

episodes.name: The Dandiya Dance Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira goes on the case to help Meena find a dance partner.

episodes.name: The Case of the Funky Fountain
episodes.overview: When a strange clay starts showing up in Jalpur’s water sources, Mira is on the case to stop it.

episodes.name: The Dasara Festival Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira and her friends go to the Dasara Festival to find Anoop before the elephant procession.

episodes.name: The Puppy Dog Detective Mystery
episodes.overview: When things in Jalpur start mysteriously breaking, Mira and friends must solve the case.

episodes.name: The Case of the Mysterious Necklace
episodes.overview: Mira goes on the case to help figure out who sent Meena a necklace.

episodes.name: The Great Donkey Mystery
episodes.overview: When a delivery of pink salt for the spice shop goes missing, Mira is on the case to find out what happened.

episodes.name: The Case of the Missing Lehenga Choli
episodes.overview: Mira is on the case to find a special lehenga for Dimple.

episodes.name: The Case of the Mysterious House
episodes.overview: Mira and her friends go on a case to find Mikku and Chikku’s missing lucky ball.

episodes.name: The Case of the Secret Code
episodes.overview: Mira is on a special case from Detective Gupta that will take her detective skills to the next level.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Snake Boat Race
episodes.overview: Mira goes on the case when strange things happen during a snake boat race.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Food Festival
episodes.overview: When Mikku and Chikku are blamed for snacks that go missing, Mira goes on the case to find out what really happened.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Missing Bangles
episodes.overview: When Mira's Uncle Naveen can't find Auntie Pushpa's bangles, Mira helps him find them.

episodes.name: The Case of the Missing Mystery
episodes.overview: While teaching a class on how to be a detective, Mira's clues for the lesson go missing.

episodes.name: Mystery at the Gili Danda Game
episodes.overview: Mira goes on the case when a mysterious gift of painted Gili Danda sticks is left for her.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Jalpur Jammers
episodes.overview: When Dad and Auntie are not where they're supposed to be, Mira is on the case to find them.

episodes.name: Mystery of the Blue Jewel
episodes.overview: When a present for Queen Shanti goes missing, Mira is on the case to find it.

episodes.name: The Case of the Mystery Mehfil
The Mystery of the Legendary Sword
episodes.overview: Mira and her friends embark on an epic quest to find a legendary sword said to belong to the rightful ruler of Jalpur.

episodes.name: Mikku and Chikku’s Hometown Mystery
episodes.overview: Mira is thrilled to accompany Mikku and Chikku to their hometown, a mongoose-filled village where she meets their parents, joins a local festival and helps solve a surprising mystery.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Royal Flight
episodes.overview: When Neel’s new flying invention gets a mysterious hole during a big royal event, Mira must figure out what happened before it’s too late.

episodes.name: The Big Jalpur Wedding Mystery
episodes.overview: It’s the day of a huge, joyful wedding in Jalpur, and Mira and her friends must track down the missing groom so the wedding can go on as planned.
